scripts.dev: engine-version && npm run build --workspace=unicore-common && lerna run dev --parallel --no-bail
scripts.build:all: engine-version && npm run build -w unicore-common && npm run build --workspaces --if-present
scripts.build: engine-version && npm run postbuild -w unicore-server && npm run build -w unicore-client
scripts.boot: npx lerna bootstrap && npm run build && npm link -w unicore-server && npm run sync
